The expert checked 2016: 17 per-student budgeted spending in a dozen high-enrollment districts starting from a Texas Education Agency website.
The expert found that the Austin school: 10,949 per student, which was reached by dividing $906,180,314 shown in AISD state, local, and federal receipts by its 82,766 students.
The expert identified only one high: enrollment district, the Dallas district, with a greater per-student figure of $11,377 in receipts per student.
The expert found that 10 other districts: including Houston, San Antonio, Fort Worth, El Paso, and Corpus Christi, drew less in receipts per student compared to the Austin district.
